name: wakatime
description: Fitbit for programmers. Get automated metrics and insights about your programming.
author: WakaTime <support@wakatime.com>

ignore.title: Exclude File Paths
ignore.description: Exclude these file paths from logging; POSIX regex patterns

showStatusBarIcon.title: Show WakaTime in Atom status bar
showStatusBarIcon.description: Add an icon to Atom's status bar with WakaTime info. Hovering over the icon shows current WakaTime status or error message.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: Logs verbose debug messages to the Atom developer console and ~/.wakatime.log file.
